```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```



# Installation

```{r installation, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("mbojan/maxqdar")
```


# Usage

```{r}
library(maxqdar)
f <- system.file("exdata/test.mex", package="maxqdar")
extract_mex_codings(f)
```
